discourse_list.title: Article: \xe2\x80\x9cThe [SEC] is the Number One Blocker,\xe2\x80\x9d says Chamber of Digital Commerce Founder

content.content: This is more of what we probably already know but people are talking about it. At the DC Blockchain Summit in Washington on Tuesday Perianne Boring, founder and CEO of the Chamber of Digital Commerce, said “It’s very clear that the US Securities and Exchange Commission is the number one blocker to this industry having economic progress and springing an economic boom in this country that we haven’t seen in decades.”    Blockworks – 24 May 22    “The [SEC] is the Number One Blocker,” says Chamber of Digital Commerce... The recent executive order on digital assets did not provide tangible policy that many institutions and investors are awaiting  Est. reading time: 2 minutes       My take is we are in for a long ride so please buckle up.
